channel.title: [HOSTER] Looking For a RSPS Coder! [HOSTER]
channel.description:
Hello my name is Jason and i am looking for a RSPS Coder Iv been hosting a Minecraft server for over 6 months with over 30+ People online at once with 0 lag. I had to close my Minecraft server for personal reasons. I had a server awhile back with over 40+ active members. I want to get back into the RSPS life. I have 8.00GB of ram installed on my computer. My computer is left on 24/7 so there will be no downtime. I'm in need of a coder because i have no idea how to code (Co-Owner) We have a Web Designer and a advertiser. Now looking for a coder. I'm 17 and out of school so i can be reached anytime. Please Post on this thread or Skype me for more instant response. Skype: Jasonmc1333
Name: Age: Where you come from: Experience: Email or type of contact reference:
